pageTitle: Itinerary for Monday, December 18, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Monday, December 18, 2017:

Ottawa, Ontario

9:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the swearing-in ceremony of the new Chief Justice of Canada, the Honourable Richard Wagner.

Rideau Hall
1 Sussex Drive

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Accredited media are asked to confirm their attendance with the Rideau Hall Press Office at 613-998-0287.
  • Media should arriveat the Princess Anne entrance no later than 8:30 a.m.

Montréal, Quebec

4:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Mayor of Villeray–Saint-Michel–Parc-Extension, Giuliana Fumagalli.

Cabinet du conseil d’arrondissement Villeray
405 avenue Ogilvy

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting
  • Media should arrive no later than 3:45 p.m.

4:45 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with municipal councillors of Villeray–Saint-Michel–Parc-Extension.

Cabinet du conseil d’arrondissement Villeray
405 avenue Ogilvy

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting
  • Media should arrive no later than 3:45 p.m.
